main_topic.author: alekh
main_topic.title: Can't download submission tar
main_topic.content:
Nothing happens when I click download on the submission tar file. Smaller main.py downloads fine. But nothing happens when I try to download the big tarball…

What gives?

comments.author: alekhTopic Author
comments.content: Just had to wait. All of the sudden it started, having being downloaded in the background without any progress bar..  Bad UX
comments.date: Posted 3 months ago  ·  410th in this Competition
